snippet: A member of Word of Life Christian Church in central New York told investigators that Lucas Leonard was attacked after he said he wanted elders to die and had considered making a voodoo doll of one leader.

byline.contributor: Jesse McKinley and Rick Rojas reported from New Hartford, and Benjamin Mueller from New York. Nate Schweber contributed reporting from New Hartford, and Susan C. Beachy contributed research.
byline.original: By JESSE McKINLEY, BENJAMIN MUELLER and RICK ROJAS

abstract: Witnesses testifying at trial surrounding beating death of 19-year-old Lucas Leonard at Word of Life Christian Church in New Hartford, NY, say violence against Leonard may have been precipitated by accusations that he was practicing witchcraft and wanted church elders to die.

keywords.value: Word of Life Christian Church (New Hartford, NY)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: A member of Word of Life Christian Church in central New York told investigators that Lucas Leonard was attacked after he said he wanted elders to die and had considered making a voodoo doll of one leader.

headline.print_headline: Witness Says Clash Over Witchcraft Preceded a Teenager’s Fatal Beating
headline.main: Witness Says Clash Over Witchcraft Preceded Fatal Beating at Church
